sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import MainScreen from '../Components/MainScreen' import { Accordion, Badge, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import notes from "../data/data" import axios from "axios" const MyNotes = () => { const [notes,setNotes] = useState([]) const fetchNotes = async()=>{ const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:5001/api/notes"); const data = response.data setNotes(data) } useEffect(()=>{ fetchNotes() },[]) const deleteHandler = (id)=>{ if(window.confirm("Are You Sure?")){ } } return ( { notes.map((note,index)=>( {note.title}

Category - {note.category}

{note.content}

Created on be date
)) } ) } export default MyNotes
